attributes.action: Change of pension age to claim state pension
attributes.additional_details: We think it is immoral that the government has changed the retirement age for those born on or after 6th December 1953 to the 6th of October 1954. Changing the age of retirement for people so close to 65 is wrong and we want the government to allow those people affected to be able to claim state pension at age 65 without any penalties.
